summary:
Over 20 years experience in an international / multicultural environment with main focus on Procurement, Logistics, Sourcing, Contract Management & Negotiation, Supplier Performance Evaluation & Relationship Management, Stakehoulder Relationship and Management. Acting as a Business Partner on all levels and being a coach/mentor internally.  

email: willem.jansen@nl.emglive.com   willem.jansen@be.emglive.com,   mobile +31 (0)6 53381888

Self starter,team-player but also independent, generalist, reliable, humorous, networker, go-getter, loyal, relationship builder internal and external, driven by passion but also headstrong.

Specialties: Savings,Contract Management, P2P, Stakeholder Management,Non stock, Indirect Spend, 
Telecom, IT, Property,Fixtures and Fittings, Real Estate, Facillity, Marketing, DM, HR, Logistics, Finance, Recruitment, RPO, RFI, RFP, RFQ.Tender, Pitch, Oracle P2P, Contract Management, Supllier Relationship Management, Outsourcing, Insourcing etc.
